slides.title: Overview
content: Added comprehensive unit tests for the `sql` package.
Focused on option handling and configuration.

slides.title: Key Changes
content: Added `TestMultipleOptions` to verify correct application of multiple options.
Updated assertions to use `cmp.Diff` for detailed comparison of `options` structs.

slides.title: Impact
content: Increased test coverage for the `sql` package.
Improved reliability and maintainability of the code.

slides.title: Improved Assertions with cmp.Diff
content: Using cmp.Diff for clearer error messages in tests.
